body.p: To Thomas E Bramlette Governor of Kentucky Your petitioner Lewis Bailey late of Company G.. 3d Ky. Infantry States that he was fined by the county Judge of Russell county Ky. the sum of $30. for a Riot or Breach of the peace. That he accidently becam intoxicated and being in Company with a bad man. who was also drunk. and while in that condition he supposes that they cursed and swore a good deal. but hurt no person that, he has ever heard of. when he became sober. he was truly sorry for his bad conduct and surrenderd himself up to the County Judge and confessed judgment for the sum aforesaid -- The premises considered he respectfully asks that the fine be remitted and as in duty &c
We the undersigned Residents of Russell County join in the prayer of the foregoing petition -- and respectfully ask that the fine be remitted Oct 14th 1865
